idea-plugin.name: Navigate From Literal
idea-plugin.description: Enables navigation from any string literal or xml attribute value or xml text to a file by name. I.e. Ctrl+B/Ctrl+Click at literal "myFile.txt" will try to navigate to a file named "myFile.txt", that is located in any project directory. For a literal like "some/path/to/file.txt" it will omit directories and try to resolve "file.txt" in all project directories. Back references (i.e. from files to literals) are ignored, this is by design.
